title: League Launcher reported by avast fix. 2/12/2016
body:
So for some odd reason my avast reported my LOL client as a malware threat and hears how to get you back on the rift :)

1. In your system tray (generally bottom right) find your "avast" icon
2. Right click and select "Virus Chest"
3. Locate your "LOLLauncher.exe" and Right click
4. Select "Restore and Add to exclusions" which will prompt a popup 
5. Choose "Yes" to add your LOLLauncher.exe to global exclusions
6. (Optional step may not be needed) If prompt to overwrite existing LOLLauncher Choose "Yes"
7. close avast and Relaunch League as normal :)

Hope this helps anyone having this issue. See you back on the Rift :)

Heres a imgur Guide for the people who dont see the "viruse Chest" option when right clicking avast. :)

http://imgur.com/a/M7Rgs

Edit: There working with a team to get it fixed for those not seeing this. Also so it dosent happen again :)

> [{quoted}](name=RiotNotAFedora,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=2EZ07hZm,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2016-02-13T02:30:46.597+0000)
>
> Thanks for catching this and setting up this guide, Mike, and thanks for reporting it Sona.
> 
> A few of us are working on making sure this won't happen again.
> 
> EDIT: Not 100% sure about the behavior of the issue, so redacted. I'll make sure to find someone who does understand the behavior better and can keep it from happening.

Edit: For those who still cant get leauge running a vast may of deleted your lollauncher if so here's a backup of one :)
> [{quoted}](name=mikejr222,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=UXnW6af0,comment-id=00080001,timestamp=2016-02-13T04:55:16.542+0000)
>
> Heres a Link to a back up LOLLauncher and ill add the file pathing for you as well.
> 
> https://drive.google.com/open?id=0BygGj78JK3UWUDJTOEVoRlR6VEE
> 
> Program Files (x86)\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\0.0.1.186\deploy

replies.body: I've been having issues where I can't run avast at the same time as LoL. I go to start the game  nothing pops up till I shut off avast. I even put it on my safe programs list .__.

I'm posting this because it might help somebody else with the same problem:

After Avast falsy blocked LOL, it forced me to reboot and do a root scan. Afterwards, LOL would not startup. There was nothing related to LOL in my quarintine fault to unblock. I had to delete the directory [lol_launcher] in [League of Legends] -> [rads] -> [projects]. Only then LOL would startup again.

 Happy gaming and best regards from The Netherlands!

Bamboo

bamboo i think i love u so so so so much i literally tried everything from dns change 8.8.8.8 88.4.4 to flush dns to updating avast to deactvating firewall, to checing virus quarintine to updating definations of viruses, all i had to do was ur intructions and it fuckn opened!!!!!!!! i love u dude sorry for swearing but fuuukkkk lol

Heya Surferboy, I only read your comment just now because I am not very active on the boards. Glad it solved your problem as well .However, you did made my wife jealous with your announcement of your love for me haha :)

PS: I removed Avast like 2 months ago. I had the free version and found out (/duh @ me) that I have 3 licences of F-secure included in my ISP subscription. Never had any problems with LOL or other game anymore.

Yup after updating the definition and removing the exclusion it says im all clear :) thanks for the help :) if you could repost this on my help and support forum for others to see that would be great :)
Heres the link:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/4GcRQJEK-leauge-launcher-reported-by-avast-fix-2122016
I just visited and I see you added my response. Thanks so much for putting up instructions to help people out so quickly and for confirming!
No problem :)
Just had this problem (LoL being flagged as malware by Avast) happen again tonight. Was able to restore and exclude from the Virus Chest.

Just now.  I had to walk a friend through this using these directions.  My guess is Avast had already shoved it into the virus chest.  Anyway of contacting avast and having them autoremove League from everyone's virus chest>
He's probably using a slightly out of date version.  SOrry im not able to confirm which he has.
thanks! this helped a lot
TY so much !!!
Thank you so much!!! I spent so long trying to fix it but it was actually really easy. :D

So i just got this issue and i've been trying for an hour to fix it. I've followed the steps above and the avast guide for unblocking a program and nothing is working at all. The files remain in the chest even though they're excluded.
I try on what you said but it still stop league from launching and i do not want to reunstall lol
I fix it .... Im so happy to play again :)
Thank you for this because I just got hit with this error today and it was dumb that avast kept marking this as a threat even though it does nothing.

i did all that now it is making me redownload the game or patches and still cant play the game now
i had this happen to me too, and i wish i had seen this yesterday. the way i fixed it was by deleting both avast and league and then reinstalling them.
And if the virus chest doesn't contain the launcher? I've already rebooted and added exception, but it's still blocking it, so I assume Avast did something that exempting League didn't undo.
The latest a vast update should allow league to launch properly :) just try a restart and then reopen league and it should go :)

It might have been the update that caused it.* Avast updated over an hour ago, which is ~20mins before League was blocked, not that that makes much sense. I fail to understand why Avast would SUDDENLY block it anyway if it's been running this whole time on a supposedly unfixed version. I play daily.

*Don't quote that, though, anyone. Wouldn't want to start a panic.

EDIT: I'm pretty sure that either something broke when Avast blocked it, or Avast is still blocking it and I don't know how to find it. It's not in the chest, it's not a specifically blocked or quarantined program in any way, and it doesn't pop up since I added it to the exceptions lists. Avast cited this folder specifically, though I don't remember if there was a specific file or not:

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_launcher\releases\0.0.1.10

It never put it in the chest, and the folder is still there, at least. I have it set not to delete anything it finds, so I'm lost. Probably just going to reinstall.

It may have been set to delete any potential viruses from your computer after a small time frame. If so I have a Google drive link to a lollauncher backup and all you have to do is add it to the correct folder :)
Oh noez! Rito installing backdoors!

I had a similar issue but it wasn't avast causing it. I'm not sure what caused it actually I tried the RADS fixes and checked my virus chest. I ended up deleting my league of legends replay folder and then it worked.
i'm not having this problem with avast, however i am running the free version of avast.
Running free as well. It's run fine until just now, and suddenly League is a virus. Oops.
Free version or paid I do be live they are the same. You may have already received the latest a vast update. You might try restarting your pc and relaunching league :)
Fixed the issue for me.. Thanks a lot :)
Yup no problem :) if you could bump for others to see as well :)
I accidently deleted LolLauncher.exe from the virus chest. What do i do now? It still wont open and its too late now to restore and add to exclusions.

Heres a Link to a back up LOLLauncher and ill add the file pathing for you as well.

https://drive.google.com/open?id=0BygGj78JK3UWUDJTOEVoRlR6VEE

Program Files (x86)\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\0.0.1.186\deploy

Dont worry ill get a copy of my lolClient for you to download and add back to your folder. then run league and let avast report it as a false positive and just follow my guide on how to get it fixed :)
Oh my god thank you so much you are a god amongst men!

Your welcome :) if you can bump the forum here and in the help and support section for others as well :)

where is virus chest? In my system tray, I went to click on the arrow that displays some icons. Avast was there and I right clicked it, but no "Virus Chest" option was found?

replies.poster: K U C K F E V
replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=xX12of12Xx,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=UXnW6af0,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-02-13T02:38:12.466+0000)
>
> where is virus chest? In my system tray, I went to click on the arrow that displays some icons. Avast was there and I right clicked it, but no "Virus Chest" option was found?

1. Open Avast
2. Hover over Scan > and click Scan for viruses
3. Quarantine (Virus Chest) is in the bottom right corner

Nevermind, I opened it directly from avast. To anyone wondering how to do this, go to the avast user interface > scan > scan for viruses > at the bottom there is something that says "Quarantine (Virus Chest)"
thankyou so much though, spent 2 hours looking up everything, and even reinstalling league several times. Thanks <3
Okay :) ill upload them just in case people cant find it.

Hmm.

Try this one :)

From the main menu, select Scan, then Scan for viruses, and then click the Quarantine (Virus Chest) button at the bottom of the screen to open the Virus Chest window from the main interface.

Ill upload some images to imgur showing where to click.
